meanings.definition: Multiple layers stacked on top of each other.
meanings.sent1: The cake had delicious multilayers of chocolate and vanilla.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a beautiful painting with intricate multilayers of colors.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally glued my fingers together while trying to separate the multilayers of the poster.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like multilayers of an onion, revealing a new depth with each peel.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins uncovered by the archaeologists revealed multilayers of history.

meanings.definition: A structure consisting of several layers.
meanings.sent1: The sandwich was a delicious multilayer of ham, cheese, and lettuce.
meanings.sent2: The tall building had a strong foundation made of multilayers of concrete and steel.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled out a never-ending scarf from his hat, each layer a new color of the multilayers.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a multilayered quality, soothing yet powerful like the wind.
meanings.sent5: The forest was a multilayered ecosystem, with each layer supporting different forms of life.
